work.summary: Lead cohorts of dozens of students at a time to learn the fundamentals of software development, mobile design, and iOS architecture in a virtual, live classroom setting.
Built iOS applications for several different VPN brands owned by StackPath. Worked with custom framework used on iOS and Mac.

work.position: Mentor Instructor & Curriculum Lead for Mobile
work.summary: Taught 7 cohorts, comprising dozens of students. Managed the development of Mobile curriculum and provided mentorship and guidance to other instructors.
Implemented a major UI and structural overhaul of the code base for a large iOS application. Managed team of three overseas iOS developers.
Built a native iOS application using an existing web-based application as reference. Used by security system technicians during home installs.
Built a native iOS app for tracking expense report receipt images.
Designed and built an iPad application for managing deliveries from pharmacies to their customers, both commercial and residential.
Worked with C# and .NET to develop Windows Mobile applications. Used Java to create a backup solution and wrote several shell scripts.
Responsible for a Java-based reporting tool. Performed a UI and back- end rewrite of the tool to increase its effectiveness.

volunteer.summary: Took over organization and became responsible to plan and host iOS meetups for the Orlando-based group.
highlights: Began livestreaming program for spreading the meetup beyond Orlando.
Held a WWDC Keynote viewing party in partnership with Full Sail University in 2018.

volunteer.summary: Participated in meetup events and have spoken extensively as a guest.
